entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Remaining showers clearing by midnight, with less than 1 cm expected to accumulate by then above 800 metres. Another period of snow is expected Saturday evening when 3 to 6 cm can accumulate above 800 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: A further 3 to 5 cm may accumulate above 500 metres until early Saturday morning. Saturday evening brings another round of snow to 700 metres, with another 10 to 20 cm accumulating about higher parts of the road.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers may affect the road Saturday morning, with up 1 cm possibly settling near the summit.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Showers turning to around midnight Friday, and 1 to 3 cm may settle about the summit by dawn, with lesser amounts down to 800 metres. Note, further snow expected Saturday night into Sunday morning.
